title: Race condition when running tests in parallel

content.raw:
The debbuilder job runs the tests in parallel after building and often fails during the `UNIT_Console_TEST`:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ign-common-debbuilder/53/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ign-common-debbuilder/52/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ign-common-debbuilder/55/

There is probably a race condition somewhere in our testing code. I think a short-term fix is to disable parallel testing in our jenkins metadata.

cc: @\_jrivero_
